title: GT 4.0 C Common Libraries: Developer's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The C Common Libraries provide an abstraction layer for data types, libc system calls, and data structures used throughout the Globus Toolkit and useful for applications that use the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Public interface
section.para: The semantics and syntax of the APIs for this component can be found in the .

section.title: Usage scenarios
section.para: C Common libraries will need to be used if virtually any other toolkit component is used, since many data types are abstract and require the C common libraries to manipulate.

section.title: Debugging
section.para: General C debugging techniques apply when developing with the C common libraries.

section.title: Troubleshooting
section.para: There are no specific troubleshooting techniques for the C common libraries.
